key.statement: (@ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:course OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:"drill and practice" OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:"educational game" OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:"role play" OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:simulation)

(@ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:assessment OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:demonstration OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:"enquiry-oriented activity" OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:experiment OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:exploration OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:glossary OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:guide OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:data OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:model OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:text OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:"lesson plan" OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:"open activity" OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:presentation OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:project OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:reference OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:"web page" OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:"other asset type" OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:"other web resource" OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:other OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:"case study" OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:"role play" OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:weblog OR @ccm\:educationallearningresourcetype:wiki)
